name: Roody's Defense
description:
Roody is our little protagonist. He embodies a ginger, who is destined to defend a root from mean enemies. Those intruders try to get to the sweet sap and nutriants the root inhabits. But Roody is willing to give his life to save the mother root from these relentless creatures such as a snail, ant, spider and a bug. 

You shall help Roody to achieve the victory and give his root safety for all eternity! 

-----

This game was created during the Global Game Jam 2023 during 48 hours by 1 programmer and 3 artists! 

Programmer:

Michael Lambertz

Artists:

Byron Gehringer

Jason Mettbach

Niclas Arenz
